comment.text: This translation key is used for the caption of a custom login button, which allows users to customize the label displayed on the login form. It appears as part of an SSO settings page and can be translated to provide a localized label for this feature.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Fərdi giriş düyməsinin başlığı' is a literal translation of 'Custom login button caption' but isn't the most natural way to express it in Azerbaijani. 'Custom' implies a tailored or personalized button, and 'başlığı' (caption/title) is a bit too formal. A more appropriate translation would convey the idea of a personalized login button.

The translation 'Персонализиран надпис на бутона за влизане' is a bit verbose and literal. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing for a button caption. 'Персонализиран бутон за вход' or 'Собствен бутон за влизане' would be more concise and idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Персонализиран бутон за вход' or 'Собствен бутон за влизане'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Benutzerdefinierte Beschriftung der Anmeldeschaltfläche' is overly literal and somewhat awkward. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in German.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'Benutzerdefinierte Anmeldeschaltflächentext' or 'Eigener Anmeldetext'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Mukautetun sisäänkirjautumispainikkeen teksti" is a bit too literal and verbose for a button caption. It translates to 'Text of a custom login button'. A shorter, more natural phrasing would be preferred for a button caption.

The translation 'Հատուկ մուտքի կոճակի վերնագիր' (Hatuk mut'ki kochak verhnagir) is a literal translation of 'Custom login button caption'. A more natural and idiomatic Armenian translation for 'Custom login button caption' might be something like 'Պատվերով մուտքի կոճակ' (Patverov mut'ki kochak) or 'Հատուկ մուտքի կոճակ' (Hatuk mut'ki kochak), depending on the desired nuance. The current translation is a bit clunky.

The Lao translation 'ຄຳບັນຍາຍປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບກຳນົດເອງ' is a very literal translation of 'Custom login button caption.' It's a bit clunky and doesn't flow naturally in Lao. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'ປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບຕາມຄວາມຕ້ອງການ' or 'ປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບພິເສດ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບຕາມຄວາມຕ້ອງການ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pielāgots pieteikšanās pogas paraksts' is overly literal and doesn't capture the intended meaning of 'Custom login button caption.' A more natural translation would convey the idea of a button that's been personalized or customized.

The translation 'Aangepaste aanmeldingsknop bijschrift' is too literal. 'Bijschrift' typically refers to a caption accompanying an image or figure, not a button's text.  A more natural translation for a custom login button caption would be something like 'Eigen aanmeldingsknop' or 'Aangepaste aanmeldknop'.

The translation "Legenda dos botões personalizados para iniciar sessão" is overly verbose and doesn't directly convey the meaning of 'Custom login button caption'. A more concise and accurate translation would focus on the 'custom button' aspect.
The translation includes "para iniciar sessão" which is redundant and can be removed for better clarity and conciseness in a caption. Captions are typically short.

The translation 'Etichetă de buton de conectare particularizată' is a literal translation of 'Custom login button caption' but lacks the implied meaning of a label for a button. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Romanian. It sounds slightly formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Text pentru buton de autentificare personalizat' or 'Descriere buton autentificare personalizat' for a more natural and user-friendly translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Пользовательская надпись для кнопки входа:' is overly literal and not idiomatic. It translates to 'Custom caption for login button:'. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Текст для кнопки входа' (Text for login button) or 'Надпись для кнопки входа' (Caption for login button).

The translation 'අභිරුචි පිවිසුම් බොත්තමේ ශ්‍රීර්ෂය' is a literal translation of 'Custom login button caption' and while technically correct, it's somewhat clunky in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'පිටුවූරූ ලඝන බොත්තම' (Pitawaru logana bottama) or 'අභිරුචි ලඝන බොත්තම' (Abhiruchi logana bottama).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'පිටුවූරූ ලඝන බොත්තම' or 'අභිරුචි ලඝන බොත්තම' for a more natural-sounding translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prilagojen naslov gumba za prijavo' is a bit literal and verbose. While technically correct, it doesn't capture the concise nature of the English 'Custom login button caption'. A more natural and concise translation might be better.
The word 'Прилагођена' (Prilagodjena) is correctly spelled, but could potentially be slightly more natural depending on the intended tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Корисничка ознака дугмета за пријављивање' (Korisnička oznaka dugmeta za prijavljivanje) for a more commonly used phrasing, if appropriate for the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prijavljivanje' is often written as 'prijavu'.

The translation 'Özel oturum açma düğmesi başlığı' is overly literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Custom login button caption' naturally in Turkish.  'Başlığı' (caption) is redundant.  A more natural phrasing would be more concise.
The translation 'Налаштовуваний надпис на кнопці входу' is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Ukrainian. While technically correct, it's cumbersome.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розгляньте більш природний переклад, наприклад: 'Спеціальний текст кнопки' або 'Текст налаштування кнопки'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Chú thích nút đăng nhập tùy chỉnh" is a literal translation and doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Custom login button caption'. It is a bit clunky. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
